name: Digital Health Story - La Rioja, Argentina
description: This project is a fork of Pladema's main project, HSI -a hospital management network across the country-. Our implementation has approximately twice the functionality.
techsDescription: It uses a huge number of tools, but the ones I'm more involved with are Java, Spring Framework, Lombok, Maven, PostgreSQL, and design principles such as SOLID, Clean, hexagonal, and RESTful architecture patterns.

name: Python chat bot
description: The project consists of a small Python web app created as the final project for course 41: Update Seminar II. It simulates a basic chat bot from a pre-trained LLM.
techsDescription: It uses Streamlit, Huggingface, Transformers, and the 'streamlit-chat' component.

name: Queueing theories simulation
description: A small Python web app created as the final project for course 45: Models and System Simulations. It simulates different types of queueing systems, and allows queue variables parameterizing.
techsDescription: It uses Python, Streamlit, SimPy, NumPy, and Pandas.

name: Portfolio: personal website
description: This page is SvelteKit webapp I developed to start learning front-end basic concepts. It's actually running as a Node server: for example, you can access a test API showing a JSON by click 'Live demo', or going to '/api/projects'.
techsDescription: This was made using TypeScript, SvelteKit, SvelteStrap and Node.js.
